meta_description.title: Star Wars: TIE Fighter - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: Star Wars: TIE Fighter is a 1994 Star Wars space flight simulator and space combat video game, a sequel in the Star Wars: X-Wing series.Publisher(s): LucasArtsSeries: Star Wars: X-WingRelease: July 1994Composer(s): Peter McConnell‎Gameplay · ‎Music · ‎Release · ‎Reception

meta_description.title: TIE fighter - Wikipedia
meta_description.text: TIE fighters are fictional starfighters existing in the Star Wars universe. Propelled by Twin Ion Engines, TIE fighters are fast, agile, ...

meta_description.title: TIE/LN starfighter | Wookieepedia
meta_description.text: The TIE/LN starfighter, or TIE/line starfighter, simply known as the TIE Fighter or T/F, was the standard Imperial starfighter seen in massive numbers ...Cost: 60,000 credits (25,000 credits used)Year introduced: 19 BBYMaximum atmospheric speed: 1,200 km/hArmament: L-s1 laser cannons (2)‎TIE/ln space superiority · ‎TIE Series · ‎TIE/IN interceptor · ‎TIE starfighter

meta_description.text: 26-Feb-2019 — StarWars.com revisits Star Wars: TIE Fighter, a classic flight simulator in which players enlist as a pilot with the Imperial Navy.

people_also_ask.question: Why do they call them TIE Fighters?
people_also_ask.heading: While in the Star Wars universe, TIE stands for "Twin Ion Engine," George Lucas gave the starfighter the name "TIE" simply because he thought that they looked like bow ties.02-Sep-2019
people_also_ask.title: Star Wars: The Really Dumb Reason Lucas Named Them TIE ...

people_also_ask.question: What is Darth Vaders Tie Fighter called?
people_also_ask.heading: Darth Vader's TIE Advanced x1 was a starfighter used by Darth Vader during the Galactic Civil War, leading Black Squadron, and flown by him during the Battle of Yavin. It was a modified early prototype of the TIE Advanced x1 line, and in fact was the first of the limited production.
people_also_ask.title: Darth Vader's TIE Advanced x1 | Wookieepedia

knowledge_panel.description: star wars: tie fighter is a 1994 star wars space flight simulator and space combat video game, a sequel in the star wars: x-wing series. it places the player in the role of an imperial starfighter pilot during events that occur between the empire strikes back and return of the jedi. wikipedia
